subject: Baseball
Fenway Park (Boston)
lead_paragraph: The 1-5 Red Sox have managed to pick up exactly where they left off last year, when they engaged in a mind-bending collapse that led to weeks of revelations and recriminations.
snippet: The 1-5 Red Sox have managed to pick up exactly where they left off last year, when they engaged in a mind-bending collapse that led to weeks of revelations and recriminations.
